channel.title: Find flash drive in java
channel.description: Right, I want to find a way to search for the drives (such as flash drives) currently connected to the computer in java. I have looked on google and other places to try to find an answer but I'm obviously searching for the wrong thing. Anyway, can anyone help please, thanks :D

item.title: Find flash drive in java
item.dc:creator: @imafatmess imafatmess
item.description:
@imafatmess wrote:

Hmmm, thanks, I already tryed to use that before and I thought I knew what I was doing, must be something wrong, anyway, I’ll try again and thanks

EDIT -> Worked perfectly, thanks very much!
EDIT2 -> I found out what I did wrong, I didn’t call the method statically, that’s why it didn’t work.

Read full topic

item.title: Find flash drive in java
item.dc:creator: @k00dr k00dr
item.description:
@k00dr wrote:

File.listRoots()
